text: "Our Winter Love" is an instrumental composition by Johnny Cowell, which was a hit single for Bill Pursell. Pursell's version was recorded in 1962,"Reviews of New Singles", Billboard, December 1, 1962. p. 26. Accessed July 31, 2016. and was released as a single in January 1963. ==Bill Pursell version== While the Bill Pursell version is largely an instrumental, primarily piano with strings, some riffs are vocalized by a chorus of female and male singers. While it wasn't intended to be a Christmas song, some easy listening and adult contemporary radio stations have the Bill Pursell version on their Christmas music playlists. ===Chart performance=== "Our Winter Love" spent 14 weeks on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in 1963, peaking at No. 9 on March 30,Hot 100 - Bill Pursell Our Winter Love Chart History, Billboard.com. Retrieved March 15, 2018. while reaching No. 4 on Billboards Middle-Road Singles chart,Adult Contemporary - Bill Pursell Our Winter Love Chart History, Billboard.com.
